beats.visual: Vacuum eyes glow sneaky as it unfolds tiny arms.
Mochi straps socks like boxing gloves and grins.
beats.gag_note: Training montage vibes in one beat.

beats.visual: Vacuum launches feather duster drones in spiral attack.
Mochi wall-runs along couch, tail deflecting dust laser.
Vacuum powers up tornado mode, carpets flap dramatically.
beats.gag_note: TV remote clings for dear life.

beats.visual: Mochi summons pile of lint sidekicks to chant cheers.
Vacuum slips on stray yarn; dramatic slow spin mid-air.
Mochi boops power button with heroic paw pose.
Vacuum ejects trophy pile of rescued socks as Mochi bows.

tts_line: Mochi refuses to lose another sock trophy.
style_prompt: cartoon chubby white cat, plush texture hints, clean bold outlines, flat pastel colors, soft rim light, dynamic angle, vertical 9:16, living room robo vacuum duel with cartoon energy beams, fast cuts, vertical 9:16
